channel.title: About on Zekai Lu (陸澤凱)
channel.description: Recent content in About on Zekai Lu (陸澤凱)

item.title: About
item.description: About Me Zekai Lu(陸澤凱) is a social science researcher who is currently an MA(thesis-based) student in the Department of Sociology at McGill University. His areas of interest include medical sociology, social psychology and computational sociology.Zekai hopes to focus on the field of medical sociology in his graduate research. Zekai has already published many works on some English and Chinese journal. Zekai’s favourite poem is by Du Fu, 窗含西岭千秋雪，门泊东吴万里船。 This poem depicts a magnificent scene in the transition zone between the Tibetan plateau and the Chengdu plain — Snow from the Tibetan plateau, which has not melted for a thousand years, is in the window, while outside the door are ships ready to sail to the far east (i.
